metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9209 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
libqpdf.a in QPDF 6.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion and stack consumption) via a crafted PDF document, related to QPDFObjectHandle::parseInternal, aka qpdf-infiniteloop2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf21 - 8.0.2-3~16.04.1
qpdf - 8.0.2-3~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: qpdf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.2-3~16.04.1').
